mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.product_unum, COUNT(*) count FROM reply r LEFT OUTER JOIN payment p ON r.payment_unum = p.payment_unum GROUP BY p.product_unum) v FULL OUTER JOIN product d ON v.product_unum = d.product_unum WHERE category_unum = #{categoryUnum} ORDER BY v.count nulls last, v.count desc
